website_summaries.verdict: Premium shampoo with an eye on skin and scalp care underneath. Good choice to keep the head healthy overall.
pros: Helps to moisturize the hair and scalp
Good for those who live in drier climates or for more sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful shampoo has revived my over-processed, dried-out hair. Not only does it leave my hair soft and silky, it's also economical because only a small amount makes a lot of lather. I'm so happy I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive scalps.
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those unfortunates who, as I age, is sensitive to everything under the sun. I've searched for several years for a combination of shampoo/conditioner that won't make me itch! Finally I tried this shampoo and a Giovanni conditioner many months ago and have had no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo! The only one I've been using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo! The only one I've been using the last few years! Leaves my hair super soft! I also really like their hair serum is well!

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product
customer_reviews.text: Very weird smell to the shampoo, not sure what it is but it’s really unpleasant and lingers in your hair. I’ll just purchase this item in store from now on. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: No miracles, but good.

customer_reviews.title: Polishes your 'do in no time!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical about hair products. I've tried shampoos that are supposed to do everything from curl to de-frizz to shine to soften and have never noticed a real difference with my hair. Not this time! After two or three washes with Giovanni Smooth as Silk, my hair looked so much shinier that I felt like a shampoo commercial model. I actually stood in front of the mirror tossing my hair around and sultrily whispering "Because you're worth it." I never expected such drastic results from a vegan shampoo; Giovanni is 100% worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Started using this because I liked the leave in conditioner so much
customer_reviews.text: Started using this because I liked the leave in conditioner so much, I figured I should just use them all. Too bad Ulta quit selling it!!
customer_reviews.author: JoyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite natural shampoo. It has no sulfates and is full of things that come from nature. Usually a shampoo has the chemical components as the top ingredients and down at the bottom of the list might be a few natural oils etc. This one is the complete opposite! I love that it is made without animal testing, too. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because of its price. I use very little so a bottle lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: jeanneserenity

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Smells great and has done wonders for my hair. I think this product works best when you let your hair air dry after use.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of like it!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product last year. It left my hair clean and was gentle on my hair. However, the last bottle I purchased and used seems to leave my hair stressed out. It just does not feel the same. I am thinking that either something changed in the formula (freaking product improvements that always seem to be for the worse) or I need to take a break from it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT

If I didn't use it with the Conditioner from the same line (but bought from a store), my hair would be unmanageable. This shampoo should be WHITE, not Orangish/Yellow.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shampoo that makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that a good quality shampoo really is important until I used this product. I can easily go two days after shampooing my hair using this product without my head itching. The shampoo, along with the conditioner, leaves my hair soft and silky. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it so I decided to try it and wow ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as well as the the Giovanni Deep Moisture Conditioner for my husband. He really liked it so I decided to try it and wow what a positive difference. I was using the popular Avalon Organics Thickening Shampoo and also their Conditioner but they re-formulated the conditioner and it has never been the same which in turn caused me to get a scalp irritation. Now that I'm using Giovanni my hair (and scalp) feel cleaner, more moisturized, and my fine hair has more body.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Suds well for a natural shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have often noticed that when I buy all-natural shampoos, they don't suds up as well as normal shampoos. This one works well, though, and it smells good too!

customer_reviews.title: I like Giovanni products
customer_reviews.text: I like Giovanni products, but they are not really 100% natural. They have a lot of chemical ingredients that do worry me. I bought this because I haven't yet found a good shampoo that is 100% natural that doesn't cost a fortune. I've even used natural dish soap as a shampoo, and it worked pretty well for my hair. I may just go back to using that.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what it's supposed to do...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an African American woman that recently went from relaxed to natural hair, so I've been experimenting with products that will keep my hair moisturized and this, along with the Giovanni Smooth as Silk conditioner, the Direct leave in conditioner, and the VitaPro fusion treatment seems to help a lot.

From the experience with the shampoo. I am planning to get the conditioner. So far, I absolutely love this shampoo and the hello hydration shampoo and conditioner 2 in 1. Imagine this shampoo gives me the same result as a 2 in 1. That's amazing. Truly smooth as silk. By the way, I have 4a/4b hair.

Absolutely love the smell of this shampoo too. Best ever!

customer_reviews.title: I like it but my tresses don't!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a love/hate affair with this shampoo. It has a great smell and a silky feel on my skin, but washing my hair with it is a different story. It got my hair so clean that it actually squeaked when I towel dried it--felt more like I had used a deep-clean dish detergent rather than shampoo! And, believe me, you'll need conditioner. No comb or brush can get through your locks after shampooing with this product. Having said that, I'm still enamoured with the smell and texture of this shampoo, and while I no longer use it on my hair, it's great for washing up after I finish working in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: This completely dried my hair out. I've been transitioning from relaxed to natural for about three months now and it was time to switch to a sulfate free shampoo. I made the mistake of choosing this one. My hair was stringy and dry after one pass and I had to deep condition for much longer than I normally do. It smelled great and my scalp does feel clean but it did nothing for my actual hair.

product_meta.title: Giovanni Cosmetics Eco Chic Smooth as Silk Shampoo Deep Moisture for Damaged Hair, 8.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: When your hair is brittle and over processed, normal shampoo just strips your hair of the oils it needs to heal and makes the damage worse! Giovanni Eco Chic Smooth As Silk Shampoo gently cleanses dry, chemically processed hair without the use of sulfates and harsh detergents. Instead, a soothing combination of vegetable proteins and certified organic botanical extracts, including Chamomile, Aloe, Echinacea, and Apple, work together to cleanse, nourish, and deeply moisturize damaged hair. Your hair will not only be smoother and more manageable, but it will be luxuriously shiny, too! This shampoo is also ideal for washing unruly or frizzy hair without over-drying. Giovanni products are vegan and cruelty-free. Made in the U.S.A.
